question: Northern hemisphere is considered as more suitable for deep-space observation. Which among the following is a correct reason for this?
option1: North Pole faces galactic centre of the Milky Way
option2: North Pole faces away from galactic centre of the Milky Way
option3: North Pole is farthest from Sun all around a year
option4: Earth is inclined 1.57869Â° to Invariable plane
answer: North Pole faces away from galactic centre of the Milky Way
